Subject: We'd love to hear from you, your feedback matters to us.
Html-part:
PRECISION IS OUR PROFESSION

Hello from Mitutoyo!

Dear Thuy Doan,


We’ve chosen you as one of our webpage registered users to ask about your experience or views on Mitutoyo Measuring Instruments.

If you have a spare moment, would you be willing to answer a few questions? We will greatly appreciate your feedback.


Upon completion, we have prepared an e-copy of the “Check Points for Small Tools Instruments” to show our appreciation for free.

Mitutoyo has put together a “Check Points for Small Tools Instruments” booklet to help anyone get the best use of a Mitutoyo measuring instrument. We sincerely hope it will help you.


Just click here to start it.

The booklet giveaway will close in a week!

*Our short survey takes about 8 minutes to complete.


Your personal data in relation to the sending of this email is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy (Mitutoyo Asia Pacific- Privacy Policy). Please read and agree to this Privacy Policy before responding to this questionnaire. By responding to this questionnaire, you are deemed to have agreed to this Privacy Policy for us to process and handle your personal data in accordance with therewith.

Thank you,

Mitutoyo Support Team

Follow us on social media!

24 Kallang Avenue, Mitutoyo Building,

SINGAPORE 339415
